general.infoGlobalType: There can be only be one "{typeName}" number range. Changes to the number range of type "{typeName}" have to be made here and will globally affect all Sales Channels.
general.infoGlobal: You cannot change a global number range's type. But you can create additional number ranges for most types and particular Sales Channels back in the overview.
general.infoSalesChannelBound: To change a number range's type, remove all Sales Channel assignments first.

list.textDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the number range "{name}"?

detail.messageSaveError: Number range "{name}" has not been saved.
detail.helpTextAdvancedField:
Advanced pattern definition:
{'{prefix}_{n}_{suffix}'}
  • 'n' is the defined start number
  • ('_' is an arbitrarily chosen separator)

    • Use e.g. the PHP parameter 'date':
  • {'{date}'}: International date format (YYYY-MM-DD)
  • {'{date_dmy}'}: User defined date format (DD-MM-YY)
detail.errorPatternNeededMessage: No pattern defined. Please define at least a start value.
detail.infoStartDecrementMessage: Changes to the start number will only take effect when the start number is higher than the current number.
